1.title: Junior/Middle/Senior Back-end Developer
1.job_description:
[
Требование к кандидату:
Базовые знания JavaScript (Node.js, Express, ES6)
Опыт работы с SQL или NoSql базами данных
Знание OOP и MVC
Мы приветствуем:
Работу в команде,
Внимательность,
Добросовестность,
Ответственность,
Желание развиваться.
Будет плюсом:
Знание английского среднего уровня (Хотя бы на уровне чтения документации и письменных ответов со словарем)
Умение и навыки работы с фреймворками Node
Умение работать с GIT
Мы предлагаем:
Своевременную ЗП с перспективой роста;
Дружный и молодой коллектив, где каждый готов поделиться знаниями, опытом и хочет делать свой вклад в работу команды;
Оплачиваемый отпуск, больничный;
Комфортные условия труда;
График ПН-ПТ, с 9−00 до 18−00.

]

2.title: Back-end PHP Developer
2.job_description:
[
At Cyberchisel, we are passionate about creating powerful and disruptive technologies that transform how companies do business. Innovative products and, ultimately, our success are rooted in one driving force — our people. Our casual and flexible environment encourages creativity and collaboration, so you’ll have the opportunity to initiate and contribute to challenging projects, while pursuing your interests and developing, both professionally and personally. Bring us your passion, curiosity, and fresh ideas, and be a part of technology innovation at its best!Cyberchisel is a part of intouch holding, a digital communication firm that consults on & provides holistic connectivity solutions. intouch provides a 360 degrees scope of digital services. As such, you will be in touch with people from various fields within our workplace including — but not limited to — web, mobile, e-marketing, hosting, security, consultancy, software engineering and auditing.Job DescriptionWe are looking for an outstanding Back End Developer to be responsible for the coding, innovative design and layout of websites. Your primary focus will be the development of websites and web applications. You will be working along-side other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and creating quality products is essential.Responsibilities
Develop, record and maintain cutting edge web-based PHP applications on portal plus premium service platforms
Ensure HTML, CSS, and shared JavaScript is valid and consistent across applications
Prepare and maintain all applications utilizing standard development tools
Utilize backend data services and contribute to increase existing data services API
Convey effectively with all task progress, evaluations, suggestions, schedules along with technical and process issues
Coordinate with co-developers and keeps project manager well informed of the status of development effort and serves as liaison between development staff and project manager
Keep abreast of new trends and best practices in web development
Skills
Working experience as a PHP / Laravel developer for 2 years
In depth knowledge of object-oriented PHP and Laravel 5 PHP Framework
Hands on experience with SQL schema design, SOLID principles, REST API design, Elasticsearch
MySQL profiling and query optimization
Creative and efficient problem solver
Ability to work and thrive in a fast-paced environment, learn rapidly and use diverse web technologies and techniques.
Good problem diagnosis and problem solving skills 
Good organizational skills to juggle multiple tasks within the constraints of timelines
English — intermediate or better
Understanding of code versioning tools (such as Git)
Would be a plus
Software testing (PHPUnit, PHPSpec, Behat)
Basic knowledge of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) process
Unix
What we have to offer— Interesting projects— Paid vacation and sick leaves— Benefit and bonuses program— Unlimited tea and coffee— Support for external training programs
]

3.title: Junior, Middle PHP, Backend-разработчик
3.job_description:
[
Приглашаем на работу PHP программиста в коллектив молодой и дружной компании. Уютный офис в районе 700 летия.Ожидаем от вас:
знание PHP, mysql, javascript, минимум основы html и css.
понимание принципов ООП.
понимание, что такое чистый код и стремление так писать.
опыт работы с фреймворками, понимание модели MVC.
Будет плюсом если:
вы прошли курсы по Frontend или PHP.
вы знакомы с Symfony.
вы разрабатывали для себя какие-то интересные и полезные приложения или сайты.
пишите легко читабельный код и грамотно комментируете его.
У нас, в первую очередь, сможете перенять огромный опыт старших программистов, которые будут всячески вам помогать и повышать ваш уровень. А также, — вам, как ответственному развивающемуся сотруднику, будут доступны все возможности и перспективы растущей молодой компании.
]

6.title: Разработчик Backend, BI (ClickHouse)
6.job_description:
[
Требования:• Опыт разработки на Go или Python от 1 года.• Опыт работы с PostgreSQL или ClickHouse.• Умение разбираться в чужом коде.• Умение разрабатывать тесты.• Умение документировать код.Обязанности:
участие в разработке решения на основе технологий ClickHouse, PostgreSQL, Go, Python, VueJS;
участие в поддержке решения, работающего в производственном режиме.
Приветствуются:
Опыт работы с linux.
Опыт работы с docker.
Опыт работы с nginx.
Опыт работы с NoSQL-базами данных (MongoDB).
Опыт работы с VueJS.
Опыт работы с Kafka.
Условия работы:
собственный график работы — время работы выбираете сами;
всестороннюю поддержку и помощь в профессиональном росте и других начинаниях;
возможность проявить себя на проектах в ритейле, здравоохранении, e-commerce, банковской сфере;
офис на ул. Викентия Хвойки или удаленно
Вместе с резюме присылайте с вои ожидания по зарплате.

]

11.title: Backend Magento developer
11.job_description:
[
Luxinten is currently looking for a Magento Developer to join our fast growing team. Requirements:
3+ years of development experience
Working experience within Magento, Magento 2 preferred
Strong object-oriented programming knowledge
Solid knowledge of Zend framework
Good practical knowledge of ERP will be pluss
Knowledge and experience in JavaScript/jQuery
MySQL• Good knowledge of GIT vcs
English — Pre-intermediate level or higher
Responsibilities:
Developing and supporting web-sites based on the Magento;
Creating and support modules/plugins etc.
We offer:
Competitive salary
Flexible schedule
Young and motivated team
20 calendar days of vacation, paid sick leaves
Office conveniently located in the city center, good working conditions
Friendly environment
Career and professional growth
Sport, social and other events
Free English lessons

]

12.title: Junior/Middle Back-end Developer (Node.js)
12.job_description:
[
We invite you to become a full-on part of the IT company that aims to get to the top of blockchain technologies. Join our pro team to implement innovative projects and contribute to further FinTech development.Your reasons to join us:
The best working spot in Mykolaiv 
Friendly atmosphere, corporate events
Flexible working hours 
Opportunities to improve your skills in a friendly team 
Official holiday leaves, two rest days per week and paid sick leaves
High salary and good career prospects 

Rewarding tasks every day 
Skills we need:
1+ years of experience in software development (Node.js + TypeScript).
Knowledge of software development fundamentals, data structures, design patterns etc.
Knowledge of major Node. js modules — async, lodash, nodemon, etc.
Experience with using Node. js debugging, profiling and performance measuring tools.
Experience with express, nest js etc.
Experience with build tools, code coverage and testing frameworks — Mocha, Gulp, web pack etc.
Knowledge of building RESTful web services.
Experience with Docker.
Will be a plus: 
Intermediate English
Your responsibilities:
Application development.
Highly-modular object-oriented code creation.
Creating new features within service/microservices architecture.

Build quality code adhering to industry standard coding practices.
Creating technical documentation.
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders. 
Be in a fast-paced continual learning environment, which requires the ability to quickly adapt and learn new technologies to solve business issues.
About the ProjectNiko Technologies is a developer of blockchain-based FinTech solutions. The products are approved and licensed to operate in the EU market. Our goal is to simplify global payments by providing businesses and individuals with highly-specialized payment processing tools.Join our team today! Email your CV at [відгукнутися]
]
